summary.0: A Frontend engineer with almost 2 years of experience in developing applications using React and Next.js. I also have experience in working on projects related to ecommerce, landing pages, and mobile applications. In addition, I've been involved in controlling unmanned aerial vehicles through communication with the robot system (ROS) using the MQTT protocol. Furthermore, I have nearly 1 year of experience in backend development with Nest.js and Node.js.
summary.1: I am always dedicated and serious about my work to create value for the company. At the same time, I always seek to learn and improve my skills and knowledge to become a good engineer.

2.title: Frameworks/Platforms
2.details: NodeJS (Express), ReactJS, React Native, WebSocket, NextJS, NestJS.

7.title: Experience
7.details:
Experience with RESTful API design and implementation. 
 Familiar with Agile/Scrum development methodologies

project.title: WebSite Phenikaa-X and Drone in a Box (DIB) Web Service.
project.description: Both X Bus and DIB Web Service are systems that help to collect data, manage and give commands to the real-time robot system.
project.technologies: Nodejs(Express, Fastify), MongoDB, Redis, Docker, MQTT, React & Redux, Vuejs & VueX, WebSocket.

responsibilities.0: Define the architecture, coding convention, and setup CI/CD system for all front-end and back-end projects (includes linter, unit test, build script using Docker).
responsibilities.1: Communicate with relevant parties to build and design the WebService system.
responsibilities.2: Design database schemas and implement back-end system to manage data from the Robot system (both XBus and DIB) and provide it to the front-end application.
responsibilities.3: Reseach and develop the communication between the back-end system and the X Bus system via the MQTT protocol to collect data and send commands.
responsibilities.4: Optimize the process of reading and writing data from WebSocket to MongoDB by improving database queries and utilizing Redis.
responsibilities.5: Reseach and develop a service on the drone to decode data, send commands, and communicate with the back-end system via WebSocket.
responsibilities.6: Help junior developers in solving issues and review code quanlity.
